Name: Lofi Waifu Jigsaw
About the game: Lofi Waifu Jigsaw is puzzle game in which you have to combine pictures of sexy anime girls into one image using jigsaw pieces. Relaxing gameplay with beautiful artwork and original lofi music will help you calm down after a hard day at work or study. Many players enjoy this game for its simple gameplay but also for its relaxing atmosphere. Are you ready for some puzzling? 55 different levels, each with its own waifu image reward! Original lofi soundtrack Lots of different waifus, cute portraits and sexy nudes! Different sizes of the puzzle. Increasing difficulty from easy to challenging Special easy mode if you want to focus just on waifus Beautiful graphics Gameplay: Your task is to put together pictures of sexy anime girls. There are lots of different poses - sitting, standing, or just lying on the bed. All images can be reassembled using same method as shown in the beginning of the game. There's no timer so it's up to you how long you want to spend on every image.
